projects.title: Projects
projects.description: This page contains a list of projects in which I participated or am their creator. The most famous of them are PreMiD and Ru-Minecraft.

resume.title: Resume
resume.description: Graduate of the Moscow State College of Electromechanics and Information Technology with vocational education diploma with honors in "Information systems and programming" and qualification "Database Administrator".

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Here I publish various information and articles for those who somehow found my website.

diaryproject.title: Prototype of Web Diary
diaryproject.description: Graduation project about development of the diary using web technologies.

rumcredesign.title: Redesign of Ru-Minecraft
rumcredesign.description: Redesigned an old template and recoded old JS and CSS code using newer technologies such as TypeScript, PostCSS, Tailwind, and SCSS.

f2d.title: Fabric2Discord
f2d.description: Modification for game Minecraft that adds ability to link game chat with Discord.

premid.title: PreMiD
premid.description: I was responsible for the design and development of the website with its future support.

homabric.title: Homabric
homabric.description: Modification for game Minecraft that adds advanced home system.

projectagora.title: Project Agora
projectagora.description: Experimental project at the beginning that was used to test how Preact and JSX work inside userscript.

renameit.title: RenameIt
renameit.description: Modification for game Minecraft that adds ability to change name and lore for items.

vkdiary.title: VKDiary
vkdiary.description: Another project that was developed alongside the prototype of Web Diary. Bot for VK social network, sending alerts when classes are about to start.

irisredesign.title: Iris Shaders
irisredesign.description: Experiment to rework old Iris Shaders website using new technologies.

localized-soundcloud.title: localized-soundcloud
localized-soundcloud.description: Project that was used for understanding MutationObserver. Translates SoundCloud elements to selected language and detects DOM changes.

vdiscorde.title: VDiscorde
vdiscorde.description: Attempt to develop first bot that gets information about VK social network users and allows them to link profile with Discord.
